features: No Petroleum Oils or Mineral Oils
body.description: Vitamins A, C, and E provide antioxidant protection and help delicate skin maintain moisture balance. Organic herbal extracts of Chamomile, Calendula (Marigold) and Comfrey blended with Shea Butter and Coconut Butter, gently moisturize and protect. No Petroleum Oils or Mineral Oils. Hypoallergenic. Unscented and Fragrance Free. No Artificial Color or Animal Ingredients. Cruelty Free Made with nature's finest ingredients-Borage Oil, Shea Butter, Organically grown herbs, Vitamins, and Essential Oils. Animal Free, No Colors, Dyes, Petroleum or Mineral Oil. All Rainbow Kids and Baby products are Gluten Free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this product!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this product for many years now. It does not disappoint. It is great for feet or areas that need a little extra moisturizing and it has no strong odor. Thank you! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for adult sensitive skin prone to rashes; does not contain allergenic sweet almond oil.
reviews.reviewText: My skin is very sensitive to cleansers, lotions, cosmetics, laundry detergents, and even jewelry and clothing, and I develop rashes and hives very easily.I am highly allergic to sweet almond oil which swells my eyes shut, and it is difficult to find a natural moisturizer which does not contain sweet almond oil. Thankfully, Baby Oh Baby Unscented Body Lotion does not contain sweet almond oil and does not give me a rash, hives or swelling. I use this lotion year around it on my legs after shaving and on my hands during the dry winter months.This lotion is truly fragrance free; I detest when products adverse as being fragrance free when they actually contain a masking fragrance. The only smell that this lotion has is the natural faint smell of shea butter. I would describe this lotion’s viscosity as more on the thick and creamy side than thin and light which makes it more effective at healing my dry, cracked “winter” hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the product itself
reviews.reviewText: Love the product itself. I have horribly dry skin and this doesn't irritate it or leave a greasy film behind. Packaging is pretty dreadful though. Box was barely held together and the top had started coming off the bottle, leaking in the plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best herbal lotion I've had. Excellent quality product.
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for the perfect body lotion for skin care and to blend with my essential oils. After reading the reviews on Amazon, I've decided to try it. I received this product via Amazon Prime 2 day delivery in excellent condition. I couldn't wait to use it. I was so excited. It is best to use therapeutic lotion on clean, dry skin preferably after a shower. This lotion is smooth and silky on my skin. It is a medium to thick lotion. I like the natural herbal ingredients that's healthier for your skin. It feels great, and it's non-greasy. It blends very well with my essential oils. I am going to order another bottle soon because I will finish this one in a few weeks with all the aromatherapy products I'm going make. I highly recommend this amazing product. You will not regret your decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adult Use of a Baby Product
reviews.reviewText: I use Baby Oh Baby unscented herbal body lotion as a hand cream and body lotion for myself. I don't know how it works for babies, but I find it to be an excellent hand and body cream. In the winter especially my hands get chapped and cracked, and Baby Oh Baby Body Lotion works very quickly to soothe and moisturize my skin. It's a natural product with a short ingredient list, no harsh chemicals, and it wasn't tested on animals. I trust that the ingredients are not harmful. It works as well or better than any other hand and/or body cream I've ever tried. I used to get it at one of my local supermarkets. I don't know why they stopped selling such an excellent product, but I'm glad I can get it through Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I will definitely be ordering this lotion again and again. My skin and nose has become pretty sensitive to scented body care products since being pregnant, so I've started opting for unscented lotions and this one is a winner. It's not too thick or thin and is delightfully moisturizing, and there is no scent at all. I use it on my entire family. I stumbled on this brand while perusing through Amazon and I'm really happy I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lotion!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing lotion. I have been using it for almost 14 years. I used to be able to find it locally but not anymore. I have very sensitive skin and this lotion is verysoothing. Not sticky and I swear it promotes circulation. It's a tingly, relaxing feeling wherever you use it. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Non-Allergenic product I have tried on my kids
reviews.reviewText: I won't bother with anything else. Great for any dry skin patches and just nice after a bath or to massage tootsies! Terrific value and has none of the bad stuff you hear about you don't want on your child's skin. My 5 y.o. loves the stuff and she normally shirks any kinds of creams or lotions, I think b/c they have alcohol in them and can sting a child's skin. This may or may not have alcohol, I don't recall, but if it does maybe it is a reasonably low amount.
